channel.title: Music – Jeff Bernat
channel.description: Recent content in Jeff Bernat on Music

item.title: Jeff Bernat - Be The One(드라마 "운명처럼 널 사랑해")
item.description:
작곡: 오준성, Jeff Bernat / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 79380

From the day
that you arrived
I had no idea
you’d be my life
But when I looked
into your eyes
I knew someday
you’d be my wife
I know there’s times
when I am wrong
And you know
there’s times
When I am right
just as long as
We both give it
all we can
And for both to see
that we try
You took my heart
so unexpectedly
Who knew that
you would be the one
But I always knew
that there was
Something special
‘bout you
From the day that you
walked into my life

But I always knew
that there was
Something special
‘bout you
From the day that you
walked into my life
Though I sit
and wonder why
I’m the one to
love you day and night
And then
I come to realize
There’s a reason
you are my life
I know there’s times
when I am wrong
And you know
there’s times
When I am right
just as long as
We both give it
all we can
And for both to see
that we try
You took my heart
so unexpectedly
Who knew that
you would be the one
But I always knew
that there was
Something special
‘bout you
From the day that you
walked into my life

But I always knew
that there was
Something special
‘bout you
From the day that you
walked into my life
